title: Keep a record of submitted information
description: Follow this pattern to provide users with a printable record of their form submission.

frontMatter.title: Keep a record of submitted information
frontMatter.description: Follow this pattern to provide users with a printable record of their form submission.
frontMatter.intro: Use this pattern for long form collections to provide users with a printable submission record including confirmation details and next steps.

when_to_use.value: **Lengthy forms.** When collecting information on lengthy forms.
**Reference documentation.** When users need reference documentation for their submission.
**Confirming completion.** When confirming successful form completion.

design_principles.value: **Required elements.** Must display form name, submission date, confirmation number, submitted data copy, and next steps.
**PDF download.** Provide PDF download copy option.
**Mask sensitive data.** SSN/VA file numbers should be masked in the submission copy.

when_not_to_use.value: **Unauthenticated users.** Forms submitted by unauthenticated users shouldn't display claim status or My VA links.

examples.title: Confirmation page
examples.description: Summary showing submission status and PDF download option.

examples.title: Print preview
examples.description: Print-friendly layout excluding breadcrumbs, filling 100% print width.

examples.title: My VA card
examples.description: Download link valid for 60 days post-submission.

how_to_build.intro: The pattern provides required elements in a specific order.

steps.value: Form submission started alert with timeframe and confirmation number.
Information submitted accordion (with SSN/VA file numbers masked).
'What to expect next' task list for next steps.

accessibility.value: Collapsible accordion with accessible submission copy.
Print styling displays information even when accordion is closed.
